review.desc: It’s a great experience. The ambiance is very welcoming and charming. Amazing wines, food and service. Staff are extremely knowledgeable and make great recommendations.
review.name: Baluma J

review.desc: The restaurant is situated by a lake which is used as fish farm. The fish grown by the owners are organic, so they taste fresher and sweeter than those served in other restaurants.
review.name: Govan

review.desc: There are more than 100 types of seafood and non-seafood dishes in their ever expanding menu. Patrons can choose to cook their favourite seafood in Malay, Thai or Western styles.
review.name: Brecca L.V

review.desc: The absolute best red sauce. Weather on Pizza or Pasta, it’s honestly delicious. Portions are huge and the staff is extremely friendly and courteous.
review.name: Sunkingta

review.point: Great food, great coffee, great service
review.desc: Potato pancakes were good. Will try the hash next time. Biscuits were great also.
review.name: Cierra W

review.desc: This place knows how to satisfy their clients. Always with a super nice mindset. The food is affordably priced, always delicious and clean.
review.name: Xiever B
